title: Century Home Signature Collection Woolmark Certified Pure Wool Fleece Pillow Protector, King
features: Easy care machine wash and dry
description: Signature wool pillow protectors are wool mark quality certified as 100percent pure high pile Australian wool. Great for all weather as wool acts as a natural thermostat so no more chills or hot sweats. They protect your pillows as well. They come in 20x26 inch standard, 20x36 inch Queen and 20x36 inch King. They are durable and long lasting for years to come wash after wash. Easy care machine wash and dry
